item.title: Trump administration ends program to track kidnapped Ukrainian children in Russia, lawmakers say
item.description: The U.S. State Department has ended funding for tracking thousands of Ukrainian children abducted by Russia, according to a letter by U.S. lawmakers.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump's EPA from terminating $14 billion in 'green bank' grants after accusations of fraud
item.description: A federal judge on Tuesday blocked the EPA from terminating $14 billion in grants awarded to three climate groups by the Biden administration.
